this documentary is pure nonsense. i was born in Cuba and came to the US when I was twelve, but i still remember all of the horror stories and am sickened by people who dare to call any negative word toward that regime a lie. this really is a sad world we're in when everyone thinks that anything that is the opposite of america is "good".
